name: Gildan T-Shirt

name: Gap Modern Khakis
description: These pants feature a classic five-pocket style along with a smooth twill.

description: This cozy crewneck is made from a blended fleece fabric that is ultra soft.

description: This ribbed Polo color shirt is embroidered with the signature embroidered pony on the left chest.

description: A straight fit jean that sits at your waist crafted from a special non-stretch denim.

name: Military Bomber Jacket

name: Soft Cotton Polo Shirt
